issue.title: [Rust] Add array_ops methods for boolean AND, OR, NOT
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4038](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4038). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have math and comparison operations and I would now like to add boolean unary and binary operators such as AND, OR, NOT for use in predicates against arrow data.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4038?focusedCommentId=16725485) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3189
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3189>
